dict.string: TalkNote needs microphone access to capture your voice for real-time transcription and translation. Your audio is processed locally and only speech recognition data is sent to Azure services for translation.

TalkNote uses speech recognition to convert your spoken words into text for transcription and translation between multiple Indian languages and English. This enables real-time communication assistance.
TalkNote connects to Azure translation services to provide accurate translations between Indian languages and English.
TalkNote may access local network resources for improved translation services and caching.
TalkNote uses anonymized usage data to improve translation accuracy and user experience through machine learning.
